pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## This library is currently in beta and can have major API changes# Cell Machine LevelsA library for manipulating modded cell machine level codes.To install do:```bashpip3 install cell_machine_levels```Or just `pip` on some OSes## Level classCurrently supports the main 3 types (V1, V2, V3), support is going to be added for more than just theseLevel creation example:```pyfrom cell_machine_levels import leveltest = level.Level(10, 10, "test", level.WallEffect.wrap)print(test.save("V3"))```Level importing example:```pyfrom cell_machine_levels import leveltest = level.open("V3;a;a;;;test;2")print(f"{test.name}: {test.size}, {test.wall_effect}")```
